attributes.action: Keep professional law abiding Paedophile hunting groups running under license
attributes.background: The UK population are behind this movement to protect children across the UK. We need to be licensed to carry out our work in a professional, calm way. The UK population must have a voice on this subject matter. You only have to look at the statistics to see the extent of the problem.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
